description: .45 Colt ammunition with 250gr jacketed hollow point bullets. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
.45 Colt ammunition with 250gr jacketed hollow point bullets. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
.45 Colt ammunition with 250gr jacketed hollow point bullets. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
.45 Colt ammunition with 250gr jacketed hollow point bullets. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
.45 Colt ammunition with 250gr jacketed hollow point bullets. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
.45 Colt ammunition with 250gr jacketed hollow point bullets. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
